name: Super Hexaclone! Revised
description:
Use your mouse to control. Avoid the hexagons.

The Youtube button are broken! It will be patched later.

A clone of Super Hexagon originally made in 1½ hour. This is a revised version. I do not claim this to be original or good in anyway

Changes from the original version includes: - Added Main Menu and Game Over Screen - Hexagons moves faster as speed increase - General bug fixes - And other minor tweaks...

Check out my Youtube! https://www.youtube.com/c/RedCocoon

Check out my Cocoscope! https://www.cocoscope.com/channel?i=133863
